Title: Score-matching estimators for continuous-time point-process regression models
Source: IEEE Int. Workshop Mach. Learn. Signal Process., MLSP
Abstract: © 2016 IEEE.We introduce a new class of efficient estimators based on score matching for probabilistic point process models. Unlike discretised likelihood-based estimators, score matching estimators operate on continuous-time data, with computational demands that grow with the number of events rather than with total observation time. Furthermore, estimators for many common regression models can be obtained in closed form, rather than by iteration. This new approach to estimation may thus expand the range of tractable models available for event-based data.
